law.catch_line: An applicant for a license shall:...

text.section:
An applicant for a license shall:
file with the Commissioner an application on the form that the Commissioner provides; and
pay to the Commissioner an application fee of $25.

The application form shall require:
for a firm or association, the name of each member of the firm or association and of each employee of the firm or association who will act as a reinsurance intermediary under the license; and
for a corporation, the name of each officer of the corporation and of each employee and director of the corporation who will act as a reinsurance intermediary under the license.
